interactive

Class InteractiveState

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactive.InteractiveState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleConstructionState, CopyItemState, CornerItemConstructionState, DragState, ExpandTestState, MenuState, MoveItemState, PinSwapState, RouteState, SelectedItemState, SelectRegionState

    public class InteractiveState
extends java.lang.Object
    Common base class of all interaction states with the graphical interface
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

      protected java.util.ResourceBundle resources
      Contains the files with the language dependent messages

      The intended state after this state is finished

    • Field Detail

      • hdlg

        protected final BoardHandling hdlg
        board setting access handler for the derived classes

      • return_state

        protected InteractiveState return_state
        The intended state after this state is finished

      • logfile

        protected final Logfile logfile
        if logfile != null, the interactive actions are stored in a logfile

      • resources

        protected final java.util.ResourceBundle resources
        Contains the files with the language dependent messages

                           BoardHandling p_board_handling,

        Creates a new instance of InteractiveState
        Parameters:
        p_return_state - a InteractiveState object.
        p_board_handling - a BoardHandling object.
        p_logfile - a Logfile object.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics p_graphics)
        default draw function to be overwritten in derived classes
        Parameters:
        p_graphics - a Graphics object.

      • left_button_clicked

        public InteractiveState left_button_clicked(FloatPoint p_location)
        Default function to be overwritten in derived classes. Returns the return_state of this state, if the state is left after the method, or else this state.
        Parameters:
        p_location - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • button_released

        public InteractiveState button_released()

        button_released.

        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • mouse_moved

        public InteractiveState mouse_moved()
        Actions to be taken, when the location of the mouse pointer changes. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes. Returns the return_state of this state, if the state ends after the method, or else this state.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • mouse_dragged

        public InteractiveState mouse_dragged(FloatPoint p_point)
        Actions to be taken when the mouse moves with a button pressed down. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes. Returns the return_state of this state, if the state is left after the method, or else this state.
        Parameters:
        p_point - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • mouse_pressed

        public InteractiveState mouse_pressed(FloatPoint p_point)
        Actions to be taken when the left mouse button is pressed down. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes. Returns the return_state of this state, if the state is left after the method, or else this state.
        Parameters:
        p_point - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • mouse_wheel_moved

        public InteractiveState mouse_wheel_moved(int p_rotation)
        Action to be taken, when the mouse wheel was turned..
        Parameters:
        p_rotation - a int.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • key_typed

        public InteractiveState key_typed(char p_key_char)
        Default actions when a key shortcut is pressed. Overwritten in derived classes for other key shortcut actions.
        Parameters:
        p_key_char - a char.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • complete

        public InteractiveState complete()
        Action to be taken, when this state is completed and exited. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes. Returns the return_state of this state.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • cancel

        public InteractiveState cancel()
        Actions to be taken, when this state gets cancelled. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes. Returns the parent state of this state.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • change_layer_action

        public boolean change_layer_action(int p_new_layer)
        Action to be taken, when the current layer is changed. returns false, if the layer could not be changed, Default function to be overwritten in derived classes.
        Parameters:
        p_new_layer - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • process_logfile_point

        public InteractiveState process_logfile_point(FloatPoint p_point)
        Used when reading the next point from a logfile. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes.
        Parameters:
        p_point - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.

      • display_default_message

        public void display_default_message()
        The default message displayed, when this state is active.

      • get_help_id

        public java.lang.String get_help_id()
        Gets the identifier for displaying help for the user about this state.
        Returns:
        a String object.

      • get_popup_menu

        public javax.swing.JPopupMenu get_popup_menu()
        Returns the popup menu from board_panel, which is used in this interactive state. Default function to be overwritten in derived classes.
        Returns:
        a JPopupMenu object.

      • set_toolbar

        public void set_toolbar()
        A state using toolbar must overwrite this function.
